Uses of Package
simulation.gui

Packages that use simulation.gui
simulation.gui   
 

Classes in simulation.gui used by simulation.gui
CameraEvent
          Represents the change in the camera -- either in the zoom or position (offset) of the view.
CameraListener
          This listener is notified when the camera is zoomed or moved.
MainWindow
          This is the main window of the simulation; it contains the main display, and while not necessarily encompassing everything -- there can be some independent frames -- it is the window that is opened first.
SimulationMenu
          This is the menu on the side of the simulation; it contains various options and buttons, particularly the play/step/pause commands.
SimulationView
          This is the main view which shows a visual representation of the simulation.
ViewPanel
          A panel with a light logo in the background.
